snippet.title: Winter Update Battle Pass Preview | Halo Infinite
snippet.description:
In addition to Campaign Network Co-Op and the Forge Beta, Halo Infinite’s Winter Update brings a free, 30-tier Battle Pass that never expires. Filled with items inspired by Reach, this Battle Pass contains some fan-favorite customization content.

Learn more about the Winter Update: https://aka.ms/WinterUpdateOverview 

#halo #haloinfinite #winterupdate
